name: Quantum Traveller
description:
Hi! We are a group of 4 Trimester 2 Game Dev Students at SAE and this is our test build for our Game Studio 1 Project. 

Quantum Traveller 

Dr Michael, the world leading Quantum physicist has just invented a interdimensional traveling device called a Quantum transporter! Unfortunately during final testing of his incredible invention there was a terrible accident...  Our inventor was sucked in to the Quantum portal with the Quantum transporter broken in to 3 pieces. He must find the missing Quantum Transporter pieces  if he has any chance of returning home!

Controls (Keyboard Only):


Enter button:  start game / continue 

X button:  Shoot

Z button: Jump

Arrow key left:  Move Left

Arrow key right:  Move Right 

Arrow key down:  Move Down

Arrow Key up:  Move Up

Install instructions

download the Zip file (38mb) and extract all (182mb) and click on the GAD181_Quantum_Traveler.exe to run the game! 

Please if you have time could you fill out this google form to provide some very helpful feedback on our game! 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScWffqFDQt664_5SSqWwHVjRj4zLRM8YawoWaCz5vBqyyfA9A/viewform?usp=sf_link

**THIS IS A BETA TEST BUILD STILL IN DEVELOPMENT**

Kind Regards

The QTGames Team!
